name: Gerry Themes Pro
description:
Gerry Themes Pro is a refined themes collection including 36 themes designed for comfortable development experience.

Features:
  • Well balanced colors
  • Better syntax highlight
  • Unified and clean themes style
  • Button component outline
  • Work with both classic UI and new UI

Pro Features:
  • 5 extra dark themes
  • 5 extra light themes
  • 10 extra dark contrast themes
  • 3 extra dark high contrast themes
  • 3 extra legacy themes

Dark themes(10):
  • Gerry Violet
  • Gerry Oceanic
  • Gerry Storm
  • Gerry Space(Pro)
  • Gerry Nature(Pro)
  • Gerry Coffee(Pro)
  • Gerry Cherry(Pro)
  • Gerry Darcula
  • Gerry Dark
  • Gerry Aurora(Pro)

Light themes(6):
  • Gerry* Light
  • Gerry* Sky(Pro)
  • Gerry* Aqua(Pro)
  • Gerry* Cyan(Pro)
  • Gerry* Rose(Pro)
  • Gerry* Solarized(Pro)

Dark contrast themes(10):
  • Gerry+ Space(Pro)
  • Gerry+ Violet(Pro)
  • Gerry+ Oceanic(Pro)
  • Gerry+ Darcula(Pro)
  • Gerry+ Dark(Pro)
  • Gerry+ Nature(Pro)
  • Gerry+ Cherry(Pro)
  • Gerry+ Coffee(Pro)
  • Gerry+ Storm(Pro)
  • Gerry+ Aurora(Pro)

Dark high contrast themes(3):
  • Gerry++ Cyberpunk(Pro)
  • Gerry++ Space×Cyberpunk(Pro)
  • Gerry++ Aurora×Cyberpunk(Pro)

Legacy themes(7):
 Legacy themes are variations designed for users who prefer project browser and editor panel to have different background color.
  • Legacy Gerry Dark
  • Legacy Gerry Darcula
  • Legacy Gerry+ Dark(Pro)
  • Legacy Gerry+ Darcula(Pro)
  • Legacy Gerry Violet
  • Legacy Gerry+ Violet(Pro)
  • Legacy Gerry* Light

Inspiration:
 This plugin is inspired by Atom One Dark and Material Theme UI Lite for JetBrains.

Workaround:
 Plugin applied an incompatible color scheme?
This is an issue caused by IDE Setting Sync, it will apply a wrong color scheme in some cases(IDEA-325237).
Please check the Settings | Editor | Color Scheme window and select the corresponding color scheme as the workaround.

Keywords: Red Blue Green Yellow Purple Pink Orange Brown Gray Black White

Getting started

Quick Start:
  • Switch Themes: Go to Settings/Preferences > Appearance & Behavior > Appearance > Theme.
  • Since plugin is working out of the box, you don't need to configure plugin after switching themes.
  • Enabled New UI (Recommended): Go to Settings/Preferences > Appearance & Behavior > New UI.

Monetization:
  • Promise: Original plugin Gerry Themes is (and will be) completely free.
  • We create Gerry Themes Pro with more feature instead of making our plugin become paid directly.
notes:
• Update plugin description.
  • Add workaround description in What's new.
  • New theme: Gerry* Solarized(Pro).

Workaround:
 Plugin applied an incompatible color scheme?
This is an issue caused by IDE Setting Sync, it will apply a wrong color scheme in some cases(IDEA-325237).
Please check the Settings | Editor | Color Scheme window and select the corresponding color scheme as the workaround.
